cast.overview: Austrian mountaineer Heinrich Harrer journeys to the Himalayas without his family to head an expedition in 1939. But when World War II breaks out, the arrogant Harrer falls into Allied forces' hands as a prisoner of war. He escapes with a fellow detainee and makes his way to Lhasa, Tibet, where he meets the 14-year-old Dalai Lama, whose friendship ultimately transforms his outlook on life.
cast.title: Seven Years in Tibet

cast.overview: A dramatic history of Pu Yi, the last of the Emperors of China, from his lofty birth and brief reign in the Forbidden City, the object of worship by half a billion people; through his abdication, his decline and dissolute lifestyle; his exploitation by the invading Japanese, and finally to his obscure existence as just another peasant worker in the People's Republic.
cast.title: The Last Emperor

cast.overview: Truck driver Jack Burton gets embroiled in a supernatural battle when his best friend Wang Chi's green-eyed fiancée is kidnapped by henchmen of the sorcerer Lo Pan, who must marry a girl with green eyes in order to return to the human realm.
cast.title: Big Trouble in Little China

cast.overview: Val McKee and Earl Bassett are in a fight for their lives when they discover that their desolate town has been infested with gigantic, man-eating creatures that live below the ground.
cast.title: Tremors

details.biography:
Victor Wong Chi-Keung (黃自強, July 30, 1927 – September 12, 2001)  was a Chinese American character actor who appeared in supporting roles throughout the 1980s and 1990s.

Description above from the Wikipedia Victor Wong, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Victor Wong Chi-Keung
